Activity: Wake up, review overnight market data, focusing on volatility and correlations across different asset classes.
Arrive at the office. Respond to overnight emails and address any urgent requests from the team.

Meet with @Qres-1, @Qres-2, @Qres-3 (Quantitative Research team) to discuss revisions to the investment strategy document based on yesterday's feedback. Review progress on refining the backtesting models.
Conduct a detailed review of the revised investment strategy document. Ensure all feedback has been addressed and the document is ready for final approval.

Email @Qres-1, @Qres-2, @Qres-3, @Legal-1: Topic: Final Investment Strategy Review. Circulate the final version of the investment strategy document for final review and approval by both the quantitative research team and legal counsel.
Meet with @comp-1 (Compliance Officer) to discuss the fund's compliance procedures and ensure the investment strategy adheres to all relevant regulations.
Lunch Break. Network with other financial professionals.
Meet with shortlisted trading platform vendors for presentations and demonstrations. Evaluate their platforms based on key criteria such as performance, reliability, and cost.
Discuss data provider options with @Qres-1. Evaluate data quality, coverage, and cost-effectiveness. Ensure data feeds are compatible with the chosen trading platform.
Review and provide feedback on the draft risk management framework. Ensure the framework covers all relevant risks associated with the investment strategy.
Leave the office. Catch up on industry news and research papers.
